help.title: JJk Support
help.description: If you need support, we're always here to help. It's as easy as joining [JJk support guild](${1}).

lang.title: Do you want to change the bot's language?
lang.description: Select any language from the list below.
lang.rights: Not enough rights, you must be the owner of the guild.
lang.changed: Done, the bot language has been changed to **${1}**.

setupAuto.title: Settings
setupAuto.description: Use the buttons to scroll through the list of settings below.
valueDescription: Removing outside invitations from a user's message, there is a whitelist.
Removing popular scam (phishing, etc.) links from a user's message.
Removing any links from a user's message, there is a whitelist.

guildCreate.title: Hi!
guildCreate.description: Let me give you a little help.

fields.name: Commands
fields.value: List of commands can be seen by entering a slash `/` in the chat.

errors: There was an error while executing this command!
